subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Keith Fergus holed out with a wedge from 95 yards on the 17th hole, capping his dramatic rally from four shots down to win the Cap Cana Championship in the Dominican Republic.
snippet: Keith Fergus holed out with a wedge from 95 yards on the 17th hole, capping his dramatic rally from four shots down to win the Cap Cana Championship in the Dominican Republic.
